Text: agreed, theres no need for rars. thanks a lot.
some people don`t have enough space on hdd, so this is better, but i prefer rar files because if one is corrupted u can only download that one, and this way u need to download the whole thing again

a torrent is not like ftp downlod..it wont get corrupted..each piece is checked with its hash(MD5)..and verified..so at end of the downld..u can b sure..that wat u got is same as the source..unless..there is tracker..poisoning by copyright mercenary hackers..
